title: A Second Post

title: Computer Programming
content:
Computer Programming is the process of telling a computer to perform a certain task by giving it instructions.

These instructions are called programs.

Aperson who writes these instructions ia a compter programmer.

There are variety of computer languages such as Python, Javascript and c++.
